title: Great food
text: Me and my friends visted Cartone a few different times during oure trip in Athens. The good was verry good and the portions were large.

title: Slippery stairs and too much tourists
text: Me and my friends visted the Akropolis last May. Of course when you visit Athens you must see the Akropolis. However, we did not really like oure visit. The Stones are verry slippery and dangerour. There are also Manu tourists who push each other on the stairs

title: Great Walking Tour
text: Last tuesday my friends and I joined the free walking tour. We had a great time, oure guide told some nice and interesring facts.

title: Nice food and service
text: Me and my boyfriend had a lovely meal at L'Osteria. The food was verry nice but they did not have a verry big menu just pasta and pizza. The service was fast and friendly.

title: Clean and nice rooms
text: My boyfriend and I stayed at the B&B for 2 nights. The hotel is clean and the rooms are nicely decorated. There are 2 nice restaurants near the hotel but the area is mostly industrieel. It is a 10 minute walk to Centro. The breakfast is OK.

title: Good lunch
text: Me and my boyfriend had lunch at Tijuana. The staff is verry friendly and the portions of the food are big. The food is howevere not so spicey

title: Great time at the Ash
text: Me and my boyfriend had an amazing time at the Ash. The food is good (hamburgers,steaks etc.) They have amazing cocktails and the service is excellent. A reservation is needed since the restaurant is verry populair.

title: Great tour
text: Me and my friends really liked the Split walking tour. Oure guide was friendly and knew a lot of interesting facts about the city

title: Great hotel with amazing hosts
text: Me and my family had an amazing time in this beautiful hotel! The hotel has al lot of old details which make the hotel verry beautiful and unique. The hosts are super friendly and will help you wherever they can. We also enjoyed a lovely breakfast with lots of nice and fresh products.

title: Great restaurant and excellent service
text: Me and my friends had a lovely dinner at this restaurant! The staff is verry friendly and the food is excellent.

title: Great location
text: Last week me and my friends stayed at this appartement and had a absolutely lovely time. The location is perfect! All the main attractions are in walking distance. At the end of our trip we could leave our luggage at the appartement. Unfortunatly the lockers were verry small so we could not leave them there.

title: Good hotel
text: Glavas Inn hotel is a simpele and nice hotel. The food is great and the staff is verry friendly. The rooms were clean but there was no wifi accept in the reception. Alsof there is not much to do in the arrea.

title: Good hotel bad arrea!!!
text: Last june I stayed for 3 nights at the good hotel. The hotel itself is nice and the rooms are clean. However, the arrea arround the hotel is awfull!! There are junkies and homeless people everwere. We felt verry unsafe and thuis ruinned our trip to trip tot San Francisco.

title: Ok motel
text: We stayed in the All Star Inn Motel for two nights. The staff working in the motel is very friendly and willing to help if there are problems. However the motel itself is quit dated. The interior is old and does not look very clean.

title: Great food
text: I had lunch with my sister at Sam's Diner. It is a nice place with great food for a reasonable price. The portions were big and the staff was friendly.

title: Great tour
text: It is wise to book tickets weaks in advance, since it is verry popular. The audio tour is also nice. Bring warm clothes since it can be cold on the island.

title: Good vallue for your money
text: During our trip to San Francisco we had breakfast at Honey's bistro several times. It is a good restaurant and the staff is friendly.

title: Cold
text: When visiting San Francisco you of course have to visit the golden gate bridge! Unfortunately we had fog so we could not see anything.
